params.name: size
params.description: The target size for the cropped image.

params.name: data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the output image. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.If unset, will use the inferred format of the input image.

params.name: input_data_format
params.description: The channel dimension format for the input image. Can be one of:channels_first or ChannelDimension.FIRST: image in (num_channels, height, width) format.channels_last or ChannelDimension.LAST: image in (height, width, num_channels) format.If unset, will use the inferred format of the input image.
